power.title: Aggravating Force
power.fluff: When your infused weapon strikes an enemy, the weapon unleashes a force that rattles the foe

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the first damage roll against the target gains a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next ally to attack the target before the end of your next turn gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

power.title: Corrosive Brand
power.fluff: You imbue your weapon with arcane energy that eats at your enemy's defenses, with your allies' attacks increasing the effect

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each time an ally hits the target, the target suffers a cumulative -1 penalty to AC, to a maximum penalty equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1). This lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Ethereal Chill
power.fluff: You align your spell with the sigils you wove over your ally's armor, causing them to radiate an unnatural cold

part.range: burst 1 centered on an ally within 5 squares

section.name: Target:
section.text: Creatures in the burst other than the center ally

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each time an enemy hits or misses the center ally with a melee attack, it takes cold damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Magic Weapon
power.fluff: Your touch imbues a chosen weapon or implement with a temporary arcane charge

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Attacks with the target gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and deal +1d8 damage on a critical hit until the end of your next turn.
The first attack with the target before the end of your next turn also gains a +1d8 bonus to damage rolls.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: +2 power bonus to attack rolls, +2d8 damage on a critical hit and a +2d8 damage bonus.

power.title: Numbing Cold
power.fluff: You enchant your weapon so that when it hits, your foe becomes too numb from the cold to react quickly

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier. The penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to the first triggered attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Repulsor Push
power.fluff: You trace the sigils you have inscribed on your gear to unleash the stored energy, pushing an enemy away or an ally forward

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target up to 4 squares.

section.name: Ally target:
section.text: An ally can fly during the push, and if he or she ends the push next to an enemy, can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as a free reaction.
If the ally did not not end the push on a surface he or she can stand on, he or she falls.

section.name: Enemy target:
section.text: If you cannot push an enemy further because of blocking terrain, the enemy takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
For each square of push beyond the first you were prevented from forcing on the target, increase the force damage by +1.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Push up to 5 squares, and 2 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Push up to 6 squares, 3 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and increase force damage by +2 per square.

power.title: Static Shock
power.fluff: You imbue your opponent with a crackling arcane charge, hindering the potency of its next attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the next attack the target makes before the end of your next turn takes a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier on the attack roll.

power.title: Thundering Armor
power.fluff: Thunder ripples outward from your implement, coalescing around you or an ally before focusing its might on a nearby enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The primary target gains a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn, and you make a secondary attack.

part.range: burst 1 from the primary target's space

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to the primary target

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square away from the primary target.

power.title: Unbalancing Force
power.fluff: You point your implement and blast a foe so that it reels from your ally's followup

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next ally that attacks the target gains combat advantage for the attack, and pushes the target 1 square on a hit.
